## Version 1.0.0

Base functions for custom Shiny functions used within the R-Sell App.

## Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("t2tech-corp/Rsell-Packages/rsellShiny")
```


## Usage

Package loaded from the **global.R** file in the Shiny App.

## Link

Package location in Github: [rsell](https://github.com/t2tech-corp/Rsell-Packages/tree/main/rsellShiny)

## List of Functions

1. boxProfileItemT
2. boxProfileT
3. dropdownMenuT
4. infoBoxT
